lines.text: Those scorch marks on the Go Wizard's robes...
If the robes were on fire, then... they could've been used to light the rest of the room on fire!
Well, maybe, but that's just passing the buck.
I doubt the guy just happened to be runnin' around with his pants on fire.
Whatever. Point is, there's gotta be somethin' that could start a fire- or at least <c=#FF00FF>would've been on fire already.</c>
